data.name: ValidEmailRequired
data.value: A valid e-mail address is required.

data.name: MinimumPasswordLength
data.value: A password must have at least 8 characters.

data.name: MinimumUsernameLength
data.value: An username must have at least 3 characters.

data.name: EmailAlreadyInUse
data.value: The requested e-mail is already in use.

data.name: CannotProceedAlreadyInstalled
data.value: The installation cannot proceed because the application is already installed.

data.name: UserNotFound
data.value: The specified user was not found.

data.name: UserIsLastAdministrator
data.value: This user could not be updated because the role cannot be change since this user is the last administrator.

data.name: UsernameAlreadyInUse
data.value: The requested Username is already in use.

data.name: PostMustHaveTitle
data.value: A post must have a title.

data.name: PostNotFound
data.value: The specified post was not found.

data.name: PostNameAlreadyExist
data.value: A post with the specified name already exists.
